title: Default Date Value
description: Default value for date field when no value is provided. Can be an ISO 8601 date string (YYYY-MM-DD) or a special keyword like 'today' or 'tomorrow'. Applied automatically when creating new records.

specs.title: Apply static default date
specs.given: a date field with default value '2025-01-01'
specs.when: user creates a record without providing a date value

specs.title: Apply dynamic 'today' default
specs.given: a date field with default value 'today'
specs.when: user creates a record on 2024-12-31 without providing a date value

specs.title: Apply dynamic 'tomorrow' default
specs.given: a date field with default value 'tomorrow'
specs.when: user creates a record on 2024-12-31 without providing a date value

specs.title: User value overrides default
specs.given: a date field with default value 'today'
specs.when: user creates a record and provides date value '2025-06-15'
specs.then: the field is populated with user-provided value '2025-06-15' (default ignored)
